g:HTMLPanel.h3: Defold is everything you need to create high-quality shippable 2D games with your friends.

div.p:
We are currently in closed alpha. If you know anyone already using Defold, ask them to invite you!
Everybody can register for the open beta, which will start in June.

g:DeckPanel.g:HTMLPanel: Thank you! We will notify you as soon as the open beta has started.

ul.li: Test your changes in the running game within seconds
iOS will be supported in beta, Android later
Share your projects with your friends
Sync your changes with them through Defold - no IT or servers required
Make tiled graphics and animated sprites with physics that just work
Everything is scriptable - even the rendering pipeline!
Features and fixes are released every few weeks, not years
Report an issue and we will fix it as soon as we can
Defold is made by senior professional game developers - we would love to help you make your games shine!
We have a ton of exciting ideas yet to be implemented

div.h1: "The Defold engine and tools are built on powerful and simple concepts that are fun to use because they work with me and allows me to focus on my game's specific design problems.
